## Matrix4.multiplyScalar() method

Multiplies each element of the current matrix by a scalar value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
multiplyScalar(scalar: number): Matrix4;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

number

The scalar value to multiply the current matrix elements by.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Matrix4](./server.matrix4.md)
